memberdef.name: obj_display

memberdef.argsstring: (int8_t _i8_current_player_number, uint8_t _u8_remove_position, uint8_t _u8_add_position, ASL::cla_display *_obj_display, LOGIC::cla_session *_obj_session, uint8_t _u8_player_quantity, uint8_t _u8_dice_value)
memberdef.name: Move_Token

briefdescription.para: This function animates the token movement.

detaileddescription.para: This function animates the movement of a token from one position to another.

parameterdescription.para: The number of the current player.
The start position for the token to start walking.
The end position for the token to stop walking.
The distance the token will walk.

briefdescription.para: This file contains the main loop and setup of the game.

detaileddescription.para: In this file, the setup and loop functions are implemented.
